name: Crystalmancer
description:
In Crystalmancer you are a wizard apprentice who specializes in crystalization spells.

To complete your training, you must delve into a dungeon and clear it from monsters that can only be defeated by magic. A single shot from your trusty Crystal Rod is enough to defeat any monster, but it must be used carefuly as you can get damaged by the crystal debris left behind. Might be a good idea to carry a hammer just in case your path gets blocked by the aftermatch. 

  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Z- Shoot
  • Shift - Change weapon
  • R - Restart the level
  • Q - Palette Swap

Game made for Ludum Dare 42 with the theme "Running out of space".
